```{r}
nLines <- 20
for (iLines in 1:nLines) {
  nO <- iLines
  nDot <- nLines - iLines + 1
  
  for (iO in 1:nO) {
    cat("O")
  }
  for (iDot in 1:nDot) {
    cat(".")
  }
  cat("\n")
}

```
```{r}
N <- 11

if (N %% 2) {
  cat(N, "is a prime number")
} else
{
  cat(N, "is an even number")
}

```
```{r}
i <- 1

for (i in i:11) {
  if (i %% 2) {
    cat(i , "is a prime number")
  } else
  {
    cat(i, "is a even")
  }
  cat("\n")
}
```

```{r}
plus <- function(x,y){
  z <- x+y
  return(z)
}

plus(2,2)

```

```{r}
ft <- 0.3048
inc <- 0.0254

ft_to_m <- function(x){
  cat(x, "ft is equal to", x*ft, "m \n")
}

ft_to_inc <- function(x){
  cat(x, "in is equal to", x*inc, "m \n")
}

ft_to_m(3)
ft_to_inc(3)


```
